sub_title: Head of Data at Not selling liquid | Creative | Analytical | Strategic |
summary:
A creative t-profile data scientist with an open mind, clear vision and a big drive to provide insights, innovate, initiate and help people grow.

I enjoy taking on new challenges, getting to the core of them and turning these challenges into competitive advantages.

Am always open for interesting conversations on data, e-commerce, fashion, art and science.
Get in touch!

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

education.degree_name: Master of Science in Business Administration (M.Sc.BA)

awards.title: Young, Fast and Furiously Smart 2016
awards.description:
Selected to be one of the five groups to present at 'Young, Fast and Furiously Smart: the best student projects of 2015-2016'.
Our team got selected out of all the students in the Netherlands based on our insights and recommendations acquired from quantitative and qualitive analyses of the social media outlets, website of Iamsterdam and user data scraped from Instagram about the Amsterdam Marketing 'discover your neighbourhood' campaign.

awards.title: 3rd round finalist Dutch National Marketing Championship
awards.description: In two days of completing cases during the NMS2016 for companies such as BrandLoyalty, Nike, Nestle and AB InBev our team made it to the third round of the finals.

certifications.name: Master of Science in Business Administration

projects.title: Het Kunstenaarsbal, PR
projects.description: Last minute PR for Het Kunstenaarsbal, a huge multidisciplinary Arts festival, stretching from fine arts to video art to musical performances of pianists, rockers and DJs.

contributors.headline: Head of Communications & Marketing and MT-member at Amsterdam Museum | Author | Moderator
Head of Data at Not selling liquid | Creative | Analytical | Strategic |

projects.title: Repositioning Materiaalfonds, New name and proposition
projects.description: On this project Novel was asked to come up with a new name for 'Materiaalfonds'​, which is an institution that provides interest free loans to artists and designers. I joined in in the brainstorm session and I interviewed several persons to review the names we came up with. One of the names I proposed was officially proposed to 'Materiaalfonds' as a new name, and subsequently chosen as the new name of the fund.

projects.title: Opening ArtDeli, PR, Press event & Influencer event
projects.description:
Together with Maurice, I worked on the PR surrounding the opening of ArtDeli. 
We got a media coverage of 100+ articles, both online and offline, on large blogs and newspapers, in international, national and local media. These articles led to 1000+ shares on social media, and the opening itself also led to dozens of shares on social media by influentials.

projects.title: Transparancy International NL, Consultancy sessions and Communication strategy
projects.description: Consultancy project for the Dutch chapter of Transparency International - a global anti-corruption watch dog and advocacy network. During the summer of 2015, we advised the NGO on key values and outlined a communication strategy for the coming years, pro bono.

projects.title: Oedipus Brewing, PR and Communication
projects.description:
For the opening of the new brewfacility of Oedipus Brewing, I did the PR, together with Maurice. I was responsible for crafting the Press Release, invitations, press follow up and press handling on the night itself.
For the communication strategy I provided a background information scan of all of Oedipus it's media outlets to base the strategy on. In this media scan I also presented advice on how to continue in the different directions and provided several campaign ideas and ideas about opportunities in the sector.

projects.title: Unstaged, New Moves - National Ballet, Consultancy-sessions, storyline and PR
projects.description:
On this project I worked together with Maarten to create the artistic concept of the evening, I wrote the storyline of the evening. I attended and took part in every consultancy session and created minutes of them to guide the project.
Together with Maurice I consulted New Moves on the steps they had to take in PR and communication.

projects.title: Chef Red, Social media strategy and identity consulting
projects.description: Together with Danielle Chan I crafted a social media strategy for the producer, vocalist, sound engineer and DJ Chef Red. Based on a pressure cooker session we tried to get to the bottom of Chef Red's identity and crafted the strategy based upon this session and identity.

contributors.headline: Head of Data at Not selling liquid | Creative | Analytical | Strategic |
People & Culture | Diversity, Equity & Inclusion | Unbiased hiring

projects.title: Laauw, Identity consulting, PR activities
projects.description:
For Laauw, an upcoming clothing brand, Danielle and myself were asked to extend their brand-awareness. In consultation with Laauw we decided that the best way to do this at the moment was a PR-campaign linked to their winter-collection.
We managed to get multiple publications on national and international fashion and lifestyle-blogs such as Onesecplease, Overdose.am and Fashionlab. The publications also created significant traction on social media, with hunderds of likes on instagram and facebook.

profile_positions.description:
Not Selling Liquid is an E-commerce agency that operates in Fashion and Lifestyle, for customers such as Daily Paper, Arte, Filling Pieces, Seven Layer and TNO.

My role focuses on enabling NSL and their clients to gain wonderful insights from their data, improving their business and supporting NSL in their steps in becoming more data driven.
profile_positions.title: Head of Data

profile_positions.description:
My focus as a freelancer is on enabling teams and companies to use data for competitive advantage. 

Doing so, I help companies in achieving tangible results and create lasting value from their data. I do this by creating project concepts and strategies and implementing these and by leading data teams and guiding them to success.

I am available as a Digital Strategist, Product Lead, Team Lead, Senior Data Analyst, Senior Advanced Analyst and Technical Product Owner.
My 6+ years of experience as a Data Sciencist and Advanced Analyst combined with my background in Marketing, Communication, Consultancy and Strategy help me excel in these areas.

My way of working is as follows. 
Whilst there is value in the traits on the right, I value the traits on the left more as they are more in line with my way of working and personality and how I create impact on business.

•	Smart work over hard work
•	Getting from 0% to 90% efficiency over getting from 95% to 99% efficiency
•	Impact and swift results over code base perfection
•	Understandability and actionability of results over complicated methods

Skills and knowledge in the areas of
•	Bringing data together in systems and making it actionable
•	Data driven storytelling and advice
•	Stakeholder management, strategic planning and team leadership
•	Marketing, Communication Science and Consumer behaviour

•	Coding (SQL, Python, R)
•	Automated dashboarding and reporting (PowerBI, Data Studio, Qliksense)
•	Cloud computing and data warehousing (Google Cloud Platform)
•	Predictive forecasting and modelling
•	Text mining and NLP
•	Exploratory Data Analysis, Statistics and Data Mining
profile_positions.title: Freelance Digital Strategist, Team Lead, Analytics Translator, Data Scientist / Analyst

profile_positions.description: Winst uit je Woning contacted me to help them with a plethora of data challenges. Using my seniority as a data professional I provided them strategic advice, sparring sessions and hands-on operational solutions to improve their day-to-day business using data as a driver.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Data Consulting

profile_positions.description:
As the lead of Data at Omoda I was responsible for determining the data strategy and roadmap. As well as working together with my newly formed team to steer Omoda in the right direction to become leading in data. 
Some of the projects and I was responsible for:
•	Bringing together different data sources across legacy systems, local warehouses and cloud, forming a unified truth 
•	Pipeline and data quality improvements allowing for trusted data in near real-time dashboards
•	Companywide BI strategy and execution
•	Data science model development and implementation
•	Creating roadmaps for data engineering, BI and data science
Some of my daily activities
•	Actively ensuring my teams happiness and enabling them in their learning path
•	Being a sparring partner for my team on code (Python & SQL) 
•	Acting as an internal consultant for the company from C-level to on all things data
profile_positions.title: Data Lead

profile_positions.description:
My Jewellery is a mid-sized online first retailer with brick and mortar stores that focuses on jewellery, fashionable clothing items and accessories.
My responsibilities lie around gathering, organizing and structuring all media data and expenditures, and bringing together all traffic data, with the goal of creating a multichannel attribution model. This model will answer off- and online attribution questions about the marketing mix. Now and in the future. The end deliverable of the data science project is a usable tool where marketers can adjust the media mix to finetune the media expenditures to enhance the effect of their campaigns.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist via Digital Power

profile_positions.description:
Digital Power consists of a team of experts who are passionate about data. We enable all kinds of organisations from small to multinational to work effectively with data. Our people are specialised in Data Analytics, Customer Experience, Data Science and Data Engineering. With our multidisciplinary team we are the strategic partner of many companies in the field of data driven digital transformation. 

Our consultants also execute project-based activities for, among others, the implementation of analytics- and web tagging tools, customer experience reviews, and database integrations. We love to share our knowledge during (on premise) inspiration- and training sessions about data and related topics. Do you want to enrich the data knowledge within your team, or quickly scale up capacity? Let us introduce our interim data professionals to you as well.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist

profile_positions.description: Univé is a large Dutch cooperative non-profit insurance company. My focus was on researching the data aspect of new digital innovations that have been implemented or were to be implemented. Besides that, I was also responsible for providing insights that the car insurance branche of the company needed. To make impact I made real-time dashboards, created datasets from the massive in-house datawarehouse, and created and improved cross-sell models.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Data Analyst via Digital Power

profile_positions.description:
FrieslandCampina is an internationally operating (38 countries) dairy production company that sells to businesses and consumers.
Reshaped client’s global ecommerce process to allow for automated monthly reporting. Build several price elasticity, product interaction models to provide insights in best prices for several products under influence of competing owned and competitors’ products. Build media effectivity models to allocate media budget more efficiently. 
Rolled out and created governance for social listening across several OpCo’s.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist via Digital Power

profile_positions.description: Pioneered Data Science within Marketing and Sales. Created 20 questions to be answered together with management and answered the most relevant ones over the course of 8 weeks. Presented actionable insights to management that were used as a direct input to improve marketing and sales strategies. Pinpointed data pipeline and engineering issues to be addressed for improvement of several internal systems.
profile_positions.title: Data Scientist via Digital Power

profile_positions.description: Developed research methods for a novel way of social listening using NLP to assist 4 in country partners with their advocacy work on the area of sexual and reproductive health and rights. The method I developed is still being used and has been implemented in different operative fields of this NGO, to improve communications, advocacy work and to get sponsorships. Improving the code base and current data practises to increase efficiency and remove barriers. Coordinating and educating juniors. Working as a data sparring partner for several colleagues in and outside of the data and digital department.
profile_positions.title: Research Data Scientist via Digital Power
